about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Aptus Value Housing is a retail-focused housing finance company that primarily serves low and middle-income self-employed customers in the rural and semi-urban markets of India. As per the CRISIL report, it is one of the largest housing finance companies in South India in terms of AUM of 37,909.31 million as of December 31, 2020.

The company offers home loans to retail customers to purchase homes, construct residential property, house improvement and extension, loans against property, and business loans. It undertakes all types of lending activities such as sourcing, underwriting, valuation, and legal assessment of collateral, the credit assessment, and collection. As of December 31, 2020, the total home loans accounted for 51.76% of AUM. As of December 31, 2020, 99.42% of the AUM was from customers belong to the low and middle-income group with a monthly income of less than Rs. 50,000.

Competitive Strengths

  • One of the largest housing finance companies in South India in terms of AUM.
  • A strong network of 181 branches across 75 districts and union territory of Puducherry.
  • Presence in large, underpenetrated market with strong growth potential.
  • Robust credit risk management from origination to collections leading to assure strong asset quality.
  • Established financial performance track record.

faqs.question: What is the Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO?
faqs.answer:
Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO is a main-board IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹2 aggregating up to ₹2,780.05 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹353 per share. The minimum order quantity is 42.

The IPO opens on August 10, 2021, and closes on August 12, 2021.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO opens on August 10, 2021 and closes on August 12, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO?
faqs.answer: Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO lot size is 42, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,826.

faqs.question: How to apply for Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO will be done on Wednesday, August 18, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, August 23, 2021. Check the Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Aptus Value Housing Finance IPO listing date is on Tuesday, August 24, 2021.
